website_summaries.verdict: Whether you need an affordable closet for a kid's room or a compact solution for an overflow of jackets and shirts, you'll be hard-pressed to find a better priced option.
pros: Compact frame fits smaller spaces while still providing ample hanging space
Tall enough to store a lightweight laundry basket or shoes on the base
Lightweight, yet surprisingly stable as long as it's not overloaded
cons: Some owners report that the cover deteriorates over time, but this only seems to apply to the white varieties

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on the time. I managed to put it together the whole thing in 15 minutes. Good product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: This is PERFECT for a storage unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because its the most affordable covered closet on amazon. The cover is a nice feature, especially since I found out the entire bottom is covered too, therefore meaning its entirely protected. I bought this for use in a storage unit, to keep my stuff organized and without messing with it too much. Since it's not for everyday use, it's perfect for me. Since it's just plastic pushed together, I dont know how it would serve as a heavy use/everyday closet. But again, absolutely great for the value for a storage unit!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for off-season store
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to store off season clothes and this one fit my need perfectly! I'm rating this 5 since it does what I had hoped it would do, act as a passive storage. The assembly instructions were straight forward and I managed to put it together the whole thing in 15 minutes. Good product for the cost. Packaging - The packaging was impressive. I could easily carry the whole thing easily in one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Vinod

customer_reviews.title: As described. Easy Peasy.
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. Easy to assemble. Just be careful during assembly so to not rip the fabric. The fabric is not too durable so place this storage where it will not be continuously bumped or hit with pointy objects. Note: there is no real storage at the bottom inside the closet. Whatever you put down there make sure it is light or else it pulls on the fabric and will eventually rip it.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than I expected based on some reviews. It is certainly better than the Homdox portable closet that I also purchased. I have couple coats in there and a few winter dresses and it holds fine. The cover is also one of the better one. I am not saying it's the best on the market, but for the price, I certainly think it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: IJ

customer_reviews.title: good storage solution.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good solution to storing my winter coats. It was pretty easy to put together and light once assembled to be able to move it. Holds a lot of my jackets and some long dresses. Unfortunately it is not fully sealed as I had hoped. The slots where the legs come through the bottom are open, so I'm worried about bugs in the basement getting in. I actually just taped them up and it should be fine. But be aware that if you want something fully sealed, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to store my winter coats/jackets/heavy sweats in my climate controlled storage shed. I was worried it would not be stable or strong enough for all of this or that I would have trouble with assembly. No worries! Put it together in no time. Only hint I can pass along is to make sure when you are putting the outer protection cloth over the frame you evenly hike it up so it goes over easily and then adjust it back downwards. Instructions state this but seems as though some had trouble. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth D.

customer_reviews.title: Winter Coat Storage
customer_reviews.text: I live in a hot desert climate so my need for heavy / warm winter coats is very limited to only a few months. I could not allocate the indoor closet space to store all my heavier coats so ordered this sharp looking (seal-able) hanging organizer. It's currently holding more than 16 coats. Easy to set-up and very sturdy. Best of all the entire fixture zips closed to protect what is inside.
customer_reviews.author: BOC in PS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for out of season clothes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clothes closet to store out of season hanging clothes in my basement to free up space in my bedroom closet. It was easy to put together; the instructions recommend a partner for a few steps but my small 12 yo was able to help just fine. If you need a free standing closet for every day use or something a child will be opening/closing regularly you might want something more sturdy. But if you will use this as I do and you can open a zipper carefully it does the job did a great price.
customer_reviews.author: third time mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy + Sturdy + Inexpensive, what's not to like
customer_reviews.text: I needed some extra covered storage for winter coats. This was an inexpensive option and it works quite well, and is sturdy enough to hold several heavy coats and keep them kitty-free. Easy to put together (10-15 min) but take your time with the cover: do not yank it, or yes it can tear. At this price, you could get several for garage, attic, etc.
customer_reviews.author: WitchyD

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn’t fit over frame/ impossible to put together as directed.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric cover is about an inch too short so it is nearly impossible to get the frame inside the cover. The zipper is poor quality and gave problems immediately. The fabric ripped fairly easily when putting it together. The instructions are not very clear because the pipes look identical. The part number is printed on the cellophane wrappers, but not readily apparent until you take them all out of the packaging and then can’t figure out what part is what. Overall I’m not sure it will hold anything with any weight, which I was planning on hanging winter coats, etc, but will need to rethink that.
customer_reviews.author: Abby K. Nedrow

customer_reviews.title: A little delicate
customer_reviews.text: I hope this thing doesn't collapse! Its a great size and pretty easy to assemble. I am just afraid that if I move it too much it might snap like the other one (different brand from Target) that I had for a while until one day it just broke. I think what's tricky is it has those plastic pieces...the poles are metal but what really holds all the weight is plastic! of course that's what you get for this price but still its not something you can weigh down with a lot of clothes or move around a lot unless you want to take the chance that it could snap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry not worth it cover ripped like as this as 10 pieces of tissue paper
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this was not what I expected maybe if they made the cover a little stronger it would be good .. not what I would say is great for lasting a long, but if ur going to set it up and use it temporarily it could be ok. I imagine that the cover will eventually tip for everyone.. metal is not super good quality if your wanting it to last and hold a good amount of weight this is not the one for u
customer_reviews.author: aubriee

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to construct this by myself in the parking lot of my storage facility. I used a rubber mallet to secure all the parts and was really surprised to see how sturdy it was after I finished. I was able to fit all my heavy winter coats and semi-formal dresses in the closet with space to spare. I would buy more of these in the future. (if I needed the space!)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Maple

customer_reviews.title: Tear in the top
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product, was suppose to be new, but it was not. It has a tear of about 5 inches on top. I could tell the way it was packaged that it was not new, it appeared that it may have been a return and then a ship right out. Not satisfied with this item, but do not want to be charged for postage back. I probably will not buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Does what is intended for me! Great price & Customer Service  :-)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Clothes Closet to keep odors from embedding into my daughters clothes. (Cigarette Smoke). On inspection I found a part of the zippered door was not sewn properly. I immediately called the Manufacturer which sent a new cover at no charge and received it within 4 days. After 5 months of use I can say that there is no hint of odors on her clothing and that makes for a happy daughter indeed.. I am looking at purchasing a larger one for my clothing that I want to keep oder free...Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I love this little closet!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little scared by all the reviews that say it is hard to put together, but they were totally inaccurate! Took me maybe 30 minutes to assemble by myself with no assistance at all! The instructions are simple and easy to understand, but must be read thoroughly or you might miss things like leaving the fabric halfway up the poles before attaching the top section. Pushing the cover down to the bottom before finishing the assembly is probably what caused others the most trouble. I love this little closet! Definitely do not try to move it after you fill it though. Put it where you want it to stay before you load it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temporary  fix
customer_reviews.text: You ca. Use this for a temporary storage for folded clothes the hanging park makes the the product lean so I just filled it with winter folded clothes still leaning but its ok
customer_reviews.author: Ms.   Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! We removed our entry closet and I wanted a place to store our winter coats and boots in the off season. They'll be in our basement so I wanted a bottom (I don't like spiders) and this closet offered that. It was easy for me to install by myself and very light to move from one room to another. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: This will fit an entire closet of clothes and then some.
customer_reviews.text: I had no room in my closet for all the clothes I have so I went ahead and bought this one. It has so much room and holds so much stuff thatI am really pleased with my purchase. I put it together by myself and used a rubber mallet to make sure it stays together well. So far it's been quite sturdy andIve had no problems and I've gotten a lot of dresses to fit into it and still have room for more. I like the cloth cover as well and have paid attention to other reviewers and will be careful with the zippers. I would buy this again because I feel so much more organized now. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. S

customer_reviews.title: Nice neat looking Clothes press.
customer_reviews.text: The hanging device itself was nothing special, however I purchased for a special need I had. That was the cover which came with it. Everything went together without a hitch, all rods were marked and packaged and the directions told you in what order to do each step. Went together without a hitch and the cover also. I was by myself and had no problem. Direction suggestion mentioned two people would be easier but one can do it. Just took about 5 minutes longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gustav Stickley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed some extra space to store some shirts and clothes and this was exactly what I needed. Very easy to install and had it up within a few minutes. I only use it to hang about 20-30 regular T-shirt’s and long sleeve shirts. Nothing too heavy but it is a sturdy “closet”. I ended up putting some of my folded clothes on the bottom of the closet as well. Fits snug in the corner and clears up more space in my other closet!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about its over time sturdiness, may update on that later. But overall pleased with it. Exactly what I was looking for to store winter coats 😊easy and quick assembly no tools needed. Material didn't tear as some reviews showed. Thus far I can only recommend it 👍
customer_reviews.author: Swetlana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for the wardrobe I bought, that had wheels. The wheels could not stand the weight, and would pop off and bend some of the pieces. This wardrobe does not have wheels, instead, we put it on sliders. It also did not come with wood slats for the bottom. (Nice to put shoes on) We kept the wood pieces from the wheeled wardrobe, so now it functions even better. Works very well, we are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: R.-Lorraine Smith

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The vinyal material is cheap. Maybe it's just me but wrapping this thing on to the frame is very difficulty. I followed the instruciton and somehow the vinyl sheet doesn't seem to fit the frame at all by at least 4-5 inches. the top part where the clear see-through plastic is got ripped during the installation. Overall, the frame is nice and sturdy but the vinyal wrap(I think it's wrong size?). Either way, I motify the vinyal wrap to fit. Overall, it is not worth the hassle to return it and still fits its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: tloppa

customer_reviews.title: ITS A GOOD CLOSET !
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions but Most important !! Assemble frame inside the cover. Take your time starting with the bottom assembled base and place to fit inside the floor of cover and work your way up adjusting the frame to fit inside the cover. No ripping or cutting fabric to make it fit. The cover has no stretch.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeAngel

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: love this little closet . instructions aren’t the clearest . i ended up installing the complete frame inside . hard to explain . maybe i ok just didn’t understand the instructions . but the product is fine i packed it with cloths and it’s holding up just fine
customer_reviews.author: I am not a robot I am a real boy from Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an identical one we had been using in the basement for the last 5 years. The fabric around the zippers started to rip and was unrepairable. They're actually cheaper now in price, which is one of the reasons I bought the same one. They do seem flimsy, but work surprisingly well, and last years with frequent use. I find them well worth the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This product only lasted a year. Didn’t go over the estimate weight. Wish I would’ve purchased something else as I hate to waste money.
customer_reviews.author: Mesha

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it to take off work clothes outside and I put a bathrobe in it to go in the house so I don't take the germs thats on my clothes inside the house that way my kids and husband don't end up sick or come down with anything that I carried from my clients home and the stores I have to shop at for work
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Catalano

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped it would be. It fit so much more than I thought. You do have to be very careful to make sure not to rip the fabric while installing it. The items I put in there are also pretty heavy but it was able to hold up. I bought two but really only needed one. Still want to keep the extra one because I’m sure I will use it soon.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: A wardrobe, or a PBS MOTHERSHIP?!
customer_reviews.text: This wardrobe, a razor, a glue gun, and Ikea mesh curtains reared 14 amazing butterflies in this sucker! Portable enough to move indoors and out. Soon to become an aquaponic greenhouse for the winter. I'm sure this is helpful. It's probably awesome for hanging clothes, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Pankovich

customer_reviews.title: sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: i have purchased those type of temporary garment storage, this one are most sturdy and price was right too, very happy with the produce and going to purchase more for temporary use as closet in the remodling process.
customer_reviews.author: Angell Rubey

customer_reviews.title: great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love it holds so much stuff just placed an order for another one..where I live I don't have much closet space so I stuck this in a spare bedroom and now I can hang a lot of my clothes, even put some purses on the floor of it and I would think you could put a bunch of shoes in the floor of it if you wanted to. The best 28 dollars ever spent and thats why I had to get another one! And it only took maybe 10 minutes for my husband to assemble, he said it was really simple to put together. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality commensurates with price
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little wardrobe for the price. I have 26 long sleeved blouses hanging in it. There was also quite a bit of space in the bottom to stack boot boxes. Easy setup. It is not designed for daily use or a lot of weight. It is ideal for basic seasonal storage that will get rotated. I found the item to be fair enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Boy oh boy , I bought two and they were perfect . Was homeless and my friend offer and allowed me to stay in their enclosed porch ( they had a one bedroom ) I used these to store my clothes and build a wall all at the same time for more privacy .
customer_reviews.author: Cayey,P.R

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Seven months after purchase, the whole thing collapsed. Only had some clothes on it too--wasn't loaded down! The plastic parts on the bottom broke. Last month I noticed the fabric wearing too, but figured I would deal with it. Completely unusable now. I usually like Whitmor products, but not this!
customer_reviews.author: MT2008

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this is great, the size and assembly is great BUT the zipper cane broken. I reached out for. Possible replacement and they said they were sending a new one .... it’s been a Month and a half and I’ve seen nothing.
customer_reviews.author: R081N

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: The Whitmore was not a good buy for my family. We needed additional closet space and thought this would work, WRONG. The closet saver tipped over (several times) and will only stay upright with the help of cardboard boxes nestled underneath. The zip opening and closure can snag clothing, and does not add to the aesthetic of being a 'real' closet. It's such a hassle to open and close, I just leave the zipper open and watch my clothes and dry cleaning bags, oh and the wire hangars looking back at me.
customer_reviews.author: M L

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adequate protection of out of season garments.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this wardrobe rack, I ordered it yesterday and got it today. It was fast and easy to assemble, it fits more than I anticipated, it is sturdy, and it looks great! For under $26 this is a great purchase. One of my all time best Amazon finds.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Perry

customer_reviews.title: This is the 4th...
customer_reviews.text: Whitmor Clothes Closet that I have Purchased... It is easy to put together... Can be moved easily. Meets and exceeds all my expectations. Amber
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: MINE WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO ASSEMBLE! The poles wouldn't stay up on one end long enough for me to attach the opposite piece--no matter how fast I ran back to the other side. I wasn't able to return it because the timeframe closed, so I ended up purchasing this one  which was actually easy to assemble. (I did most of it on my lap while watching TV.)
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Not for a lot of heavy clothes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased over a year ago. I use it as a drying closet for socks, underwear, lightweight clothing. I would not hang a whole closet of heavy winter clothes in this. However, for my purpose it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Alpacamade

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for light shirts and pants
customer_reviews.text: It serves it purpose for hanging shirts and a few pairs of pants but it’s not sturdy enough for more than one,, possibly 2 coats. If you live where winters are 6 plus months outta the year you may want to invest in a all metal clothing rack also.
customer_reviews.author: MM@NY

customer_reviews.title: Handy Closet...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this can be used as an extra closet especially to stow away seasonal clothes - been using this to store and retrieve winter clothes. Very easy to assemble and has held till now. I might get one more after a few days so I can stow away my winter coats and retrieve them easily.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Zipper not working
customer_reviews.text: I am just now able to assemble this closet . The material zipper is crap , of course it’s durable for what I need , but if the zipper does not work defeats the purpose of enclosing my clothes .
customer_reviews.author: Bee Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect extra storage
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to store our overflow of coats and jackets. Love that it completely closes up so it can go in the unfinished part of our basement and keep everything fresh smelling
customer_reviews.author: Mrsevalovin

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great if you live with almost no clothes closet space and/or limited living space, especially if you're living in a remodel work-in-progress. Seems fairly well made for the price. I bought a second one because it fits in the extra bathtub. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: eastcoastrefugee

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: So I've had the blue one for about 2 weeks now, so far so good. I took 12 minutes to assemble and the instructions were so basic my 9 year old was able to read and follow. It is definitely a space saver and seems to be holding up very well. My 3 yr old son swung on it a few times and it hasn't fallen or come loose, so it's safe to say, it's durable. I will edit my review in the next few weeks if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to put together by myself. Sturdy and holds a lot of clothing. Using these to store out of season clothes including heavy coats. I ordered two and I will likely order two more!
customer_reviews.author: geographyfan

customer_reviews.title: Extra Storage
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my husbands motorcycle jackets, helmets and gear out of closet and out into the garage.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together, the cover lays neatly on the frame as pictured. It accommodates my coats, jackets and all my winter outfits without sagging or bending. A nice plus is that it has a fabric floor so if something falls of of the hanger it won't fall on the dusty attic floor. Will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: This thing leans horribly. I haven't had it long and it collapsed on top of my gf. I'm having to buy something else to replace it. I wish I could get my money back for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Davis

customer_reviews.title: I like the clear top so I can see if I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried cause some of the reviews said that it could topple over. I have placed a duffel bag ( about 10 pounds) on top and have no trouble with this particular product whatsoever. I like the clear top so I can see if I am grabbing for a hanger. The closet is completely enclosed which I like. I store an outfit for 5 days of work in there plus a couple of sweatshirts and a heavy jacket with ease. It was very easy to assemble. even with my 4 year old helping me, it took roughly 10 minutes. great product
customer_reviews.author: Long Truong

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to assemble and Light weight to move around
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to assemble and Light weight to move around. It literally took me 10 minutes to assemble. Comes with instruction manual which is very easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Zack and Zill

customer_reviews.title: Lighter-weight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Am very pleased with this product. Purchased two of them. Surprisingly sturdy for its weight and has proven to be durable. I have reassembled them several times with no problems. Can handle more weight than I thought they would be able to. Fabric cover is sturdy although not a heavy fabric. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble - took me about 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble - took me about 15 minutes. Even though it has no castors it is light enough to push it around. If fit a fairly large number of clothes on hangars. The fabric all around is very thin so does not afford much protection to contents. The bottom is not hard - just flimsy fabric so nothing can be placed on the bottom of the closet. But it served my purpose of storing away summer clothing, and for the price - can't complain. It would have been better if the material used sturdier fabric.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Bad product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its too late to return this item I am 6 days out from required time to return . This was a gift and nobody could put it together. All of the plastic caps popped and broke. Im embarrassed and humiliated when the gift was opened, Now its a piece of trash. If u want to see broken pieces I will show u. Mad because I cant use it. Also mad that someone profited from my money and I have nothing. Could be a lemon and all others may be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pat castro

customer_reviews.title: Great value - good product!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two for our out of season storage in the attic. Easy to assemble. Really like that it has a floor to keep out dust and bugs. We were very careful with the cover when putting it together and will continue to be careful opening and closing the zipper door based on some other reviewer comments. We are very happy with this purchase. Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup, Durable Frame.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Easy setup -Not an eyesore -Durable frame Cons: -Plastic window is fragile. Easily set this up in under 10 minutes. Downside is that the plastic window is fragile and I tore a small hole in it while setting it up. Was able to tape the hole shut though.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our houseguest in a room with no closet!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy enough to hang a variety of clothes, love the zip up closure for privacy (although that was the hardest part of assembly. I had to separate pieces, pull cover over the top, and then push them back into place). All in all, a fabulous purchase for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie B.

customer_reviews.title: Not so sturdy fabric  cover
customer_reviews.text: Fabric cover ripped during assembly :(.... Rather then hassling to send it back I will just have to tape it.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have any instructions for the 3 different sets of poles. The canvas after I put it together. It was very wobbly. Then I realized the canopy had a bottom to it and the assembled part was to go inside the canopy. I had to figure out assembly by looking at the picture of all sides view when ordering the product. The poles don't seem to be sturdy. Too much of a hassle to send back.
customer_reviews.author: anita hardin

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get 65 hangers with clothes.. In addition, I folded and stored heavy clothes at the bottom.. Really love it, now I can find all of my dresses in one location. Somehow, it always lean to the left, so I leaned it against a book shelf.. This is well made and, will last a long time. Very easy to assemble, the only flaw was, there was a tiny hole in the canvas and, of course came through for me.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Moe

customer_reviews.title: Will defiantly recommend and would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: I have this closet under the stairs in the basement for seasonal clothing. It fits perfectly and building it is completely idiot proof, it took me only 10 minutes to put it together and the intrusions are very very clear. all the parts came in labeled bags. It can store a lot of clothes as well for being on the smaller end of portable closets, I'm VERY impressed. Will defiantly recommend and would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Evette G.

customer_reviews.title: Cover is crap and is rotting away in our garage
customer_reviews.text: It was a good product until the cover (white part you see) started rotting away, getting all over the clothes inside and floor of the garage. We're now online to see if there is a better cover to buy to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: MandM in SD

customer_reviews.title: Great pick
customer_reviews.text: Husband put it together in 5 minutes.. it just holds the dressier outfits we don't wear daily.. it's very sturdy, very nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Nelson

customer_reviews.title: stronger then you think
customer_reviews.text: for the price you cant beat it!!!! I over packed this thing and its still standing up!!!! and not with dress shirts with like winter leather coats!!!!! just be gentle with the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just put together tonight. So far so good and stores a lot of items besides the hanging
customer_reviews.author: GinB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfect inside a closet that had no bar! It is very sturdy and we have been very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and my time
customer_reviews.text: This was impossible to assemble and the cover did not fit over the rack once it was assembled. I tried several times to fit it over and the cover ripped twice due to low quality. I ended up cutting part of it to make it fit, and then when the rack was assembled in my room I began to hang up clothing and a shoe rack. However after hanging up 3/4 of my clothes (not full/an average amount) the rack collapsed. I ended up having to throw it away. Waste of money and my time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Low weight threshold
customer_reviews.text: Has held up a few weeks. Unfortunately cannot hold as much weight as it has room for.. I could easily add 20 more shirts but it started tipping. Currently have about 5 pairs of pants and 30 shirts, with room. Bottom is just the cover, no support, so I wouldn’t store anything there.
customer_reviews.author: SKRM

customer_reviews.title: Although I would not recommend it for everyday usage ( unless you are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I would not recommend it for everyday usage ( unless you are a very careful person). However, this closet was purchased as a storage closet for seasonal winter storage of outerwear , sweatshirts, etc. With that usage in mind it rates 5 stars. Although the pipes are the usually Chinese crap and the covering is some type of thin plastic - when the unit is put together the parts do fit nicely and holds the full rack of winter garments. Considering the price, ease of assembly and overall fit - I consider it a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 2splash

customer_reviews.title: Great storage closet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use to store les used cloths in a staorage area in my house and it works well. It does take a little bi to put together. very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ng38

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We use these for storage with our Women's Ministry to store out of session clothing items. Holds all you can cram in them, great product
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Kerans

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Re: Previous review. Had small issue assembling it. It is tall, not small. 64 " tall.
customer_reviews.author: T. Poulton

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage garbage garbage . I would give it minus 10 start . Used it to store winter clothes. Went up there to take my clothes and found this junk disintegrated into powder .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The worst...
customer_reviews.text: This thing might be the biggest piece of garbage I've ever bought from amazon. Nothing is cut right, so you get one side together and the other side falls apart. Finally got it and once there was a little weight on it, it all came crashing down again. Save your money. I'll personally be getting mine back. You get what you pay for, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Valent

customer_reviews.title: A extremely good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful closet. I love it. It has plenty of room inside and is very sturdy. Make sure you have enough space it is a bit cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Soo easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together Put together by myself in minutes Holds what expected Recommend definitely
customer_reviews.author: patrice zurla

customer_reviews.title: Nice, you never have enough closets. Unless your rich!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a cape cod home. So the second floor is like a giant closet for my girlfriend! These are great for seasonal rotation of our clothes. But, now the price has gone up$4 more and I want 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Never waste your money on this item
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely cheap and is way overpriced for the cheap product did you ever get a piece of element 115 material
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Lisa Muldoon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is fine it's not as sturdy as I thought it would be and you can't fit very many clothes in it. But it was good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: singelmomlife

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little indecisive after ready the reviews but went ahead a purchased. It was easy to put together and it’s sturdy. I am storing all my dress wear in it, in the basement. So that’s a pretty heavy amount of weight in there. I would purchase this again. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Not stable. Tipped over and broke.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't stand straight with clothes hanging even though setup was correct. Fell by itself, broke into pieces, and cover ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Read directions......
customer_reviews.text: I store my winter coats in this. I assembled this myself and it took me a few minutes longer than if I had another person helping. It worked out well as it was big enough for my winter coats and jackets.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together large clothes closet
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, but bags with parts were mistakenly mixed up: A should have been B and vice-versa. It holds a lot of clothes. The small openings at the bottom through which the 4 legs are threaded may allow insects to crawl in? Otherwise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Southern

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and priced right.
customer_reviews.text: I re the reviews before I purchased this item and they where all good, so I order it. The reviews did not disappoint. It is sturdy and easy to put together. The price is also great. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: monica Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Easy, good quality closet!
customer_reviews.text: Put it up last night for my boys room!! Easy to instal, very sturdy, and good quality!! Will buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Kaleena Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and the product itself came as described. It is good and seems quite sturdy but it also does not seem to be able to handle as much when fully loaded with suits. Seems to be great though if you are looking to hang lighter pieces of clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Di Lo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, fits many coats, and easy to move around. Great for off-season storage. Also, it is closed at the bottom, the better to keep moths away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For my daughter’s Halloween clothes
customer_reviews.text: Super storage capacity. I used it to store my daughter’s Halloween clothes. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: SnowSnow

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This closet surprisingly holds A LOT of clothes, and has been a life saver (for my clothes). It is so easy to set up and sturdy, I ended up buying one for my Dad too.
customer_reviews.author: Urnottee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and lite , moves easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Works well. Could be a little sturdier but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: chip2466

customer_reviews.title: Extra Closet Wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many portable wardrobes before - over the yrs and nothing has ever been more wonderful than this Whitmor Clothes Closet - Freestanding Garment Organizer with Sturdy Fabric Cover. More exceeded my expectations and if I need another one in the future - this will most definitely be it!!! Easy and lightweight to assemble!! The Canvas covering far exceeds the ones of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: First portable closet we've owned and wasn't sure what to expect. It is perfect! Roomy, looks nice, seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Storage closet.
customer_reviews.text: It is not Super Sturdy because it s meant to be as it is, It is sturdy for the price. Depend on your Point of View
customer_reviews.author: REAGAN B Griff

customer_reviews.title: Almost...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a good buy. The portable closet went together very easily but it didn't seem very sturdy. I figured if I put the clothes on it and it was gentle it would be fine. Today I came home from work to find one of the legs bent and the plastic piece at the bottom cracked around the leg holes. Not happy. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Presley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hang up and store my Halloween costumes. It's fit the bill perfect
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Franklin

customer_reviews.title: A must if needing extra hanging space
customer_reviews.text: Kept my clothes in storage dust free and also easy to exchange clothes in and out I bought 2 and ended up buying another
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

product_meta.title: Whitmor Clothes Closet - Freestanding Garment Organizer with Sturdy Fabric Cover
product_meta.description:
This easy to assemble clothes closet features a breathable fabric cover with an easy access zipper and a see-through window. It is made with a durable 36 inch frame and is perfect for your extra clothes storage needs. Use in a spare room, garage, attic or anywhere in your home or office. Whitmor is a 4th generation family-owned and operated business. Since 1946, Whitmor has been dedicated to bringing organization home by creating products that simplify everyday life. Ensuring that those products are built with integrity, value, and innovation is our commitment to you. And our promise is that we will always be here for you should you ever need us as we stand behind our product 100%. Whitmor customer service is available in English and Spanish Monday through Friday from 8am - 4:30pm CST. Call us and we will gladly assist you in your language.

BRAND STORY
By Whitmor
feature_bullets: A perfect freestanding closet rack to organize everyday garments or for hanging seasonal clothing
Perfect small space storage solution for apartments and dorm rooms
Includes blue cover with easy access zipper and a see-through window
Easy assembly, no tools required. Features: Breathable, see-through window, durable, zippered
Sturdy closet cover keeps clothes clean and safe from dust, bugs and moisture
Whitmor's Service Guarantee - we stand by our products, if you have any problems, contact us for help

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
